segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and I can't believe what I'm seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, pouring water onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in the puddle, yet she continues drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete lack of awareness is truly astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, two children are attempting to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a wobbly stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing sense of anger at the woman's inattentiveness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice any of this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage alone will be significant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
